TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider

summary.span: 实现将事件通知保存到 SQL 数据库的事件提供程序。

span.span: Implements an event provider that saves event notifications to an SQL database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，用于管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在管理运行状况事件期间帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 此提供程序具有一组全面的配置属性，可用于自定义其行为。This provider has a comprehensive set of configuration attributes that you can use to customize its behavior. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将是一种能够使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，因为实现，并且将通过指定中的值控制运行状况监视系统``配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `` configuration section. 你还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅[如何： 实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c)。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bbb1c959-e6e4-42b2-be62-49b7ca5ab72c). ## Examples 下面的示例是演示如何指定类型的提供程序的配置文件摘录中``部分。The following example is a configuration file excerpt that shows how to specify a provider of type in the `` section. ``中的元素``节指定提供程序将处理审核事件。The `` element in the `` section specifies that the provider will handle audit events. ``` ```

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你不应使用它来创建的实例类。You will never use it to create an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void EventProcessingComplete (System.Web.Management.WebBaseEventCollection raisedEvents);

Protected Overridable Sub EventProcessingComplete (raisedEvents As WebBaseEventCollection)
protected: virtual void EventProcessingComplete(System::Web::Management::WebBaseEventCollection ^ raisedEvents);

param.name: raisedEvents
param.span: 引发的事件的 对象。

summary.span: 在事件处理完成时调用。

span.span: Called when event processing is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不能直接在代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: override void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);

param.name: name
param.span: 配置文件中用于标识此提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name used in the configuration file to identify this provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 一个 对象，指定配置文件中为此提供程序分配的特性。

span.span: A object that specifies the attributes assigned for this provider in the configuration file.
Sets the initial values for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法以初始化类，该类具有的配置设置，并作为指定的配置文件中。ASP.NET calls the method to initialize the class with the configuration settings and name as specified in the configuration file.

exception.span: 由 提供的 特性的值小于 或大于 。

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不能直接在代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统，若要开始的事件处理调用。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system to start the processing of the event.

param.name: flushInfo
param.span: 包含要刷新的缓冲区信息的 对象。

span.span: The object that contains the buffer information to be flushed.

summary.span: 从提供程序的缓冲区中移除所有事件。

span.span: Removes all events from the provider's buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不能直接在代码中使用。This method is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Shutdown ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Shutdown ()
public: override void Shutdown();

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 调用方法，当应用程序域托管的 Web 应用程序终止时。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain that hosts the Web application terminates. 该方法被调用以执行任务，允许应用程序正常结束。"The method is called to perform tasks that allow the application to end gracefully."
